1.18.2.1.10.7: fixed crash in teeam list // fixed log spamm // buffed horse units // added back to mount command // improved recruit follow //

1.18.2.1.10.5: added mount button to recruit inventory // added holding recruits that where copied will now hold the position that they are spawned with the spawn egg // update languages tr, de, en // fixed quick drag issues // fixed holding recruits will not walk towards close targets // improved melee AI
1.18.2.1.10.4: added strategic fire to crossbowman(also with muskets), fixed localisations, fixed melee ai
1.18.2.1.10.3: fixed crrash with teams, fixed AI in water, improved upkeep feature, added equiping from upkeep chest/entity

1.18.2.1.9.3.9: fixed recruits upkeep ai, fixed block interacting not triggering recruits.
1.18.2.1.9.3.8: fixed team leave button and recruit move command does not work.
1.18.2.1.9.3.7: fixed recruit target swapping and interacting not working correctly.
1.18.2.1.9.3.6: fixed config for damage immunity and commanding recruits.
1.18.2.1.9.3.5: fixed config descriptions and guarding AI.
1.18.2.1.9.3.4: fixed item duplication bug and fixed hire in multipalyer.
1.18.2.1.9.3.3: fixed name formating for team creation.
1.18.2.1.9.2.1: fixed key incompatibility with villager workers.
1.18.2.1.9.0: Team Screen, Hail of Arrows, Upkeep, Configurations and more!
